enableUrlFingerprinting() - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.SpringRhyme
Enables support for timestamp-based URL fingerprinting for the current request.

G

getCoreRhyme() - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.SpringRhyme
Provides access to the underlying Rhyme instance of the core framework to be used for the current request, just in case you need to call one of the methods for which there doesn't exist a delegate in the SpringRhyme interface

I

io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api - package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api
 
isUsedInIncomingRequest() - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.UrlFingerprinting
Determines if the current incoming request is using URL fingerprinting.

R

RhymeLinkBuilder - Interface in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api
An intermediate stage during link generation that is returned by UrlFingerprinting.createLinkWith(WebMvcLinkBuilder) and allows adding adding name and title attributes before calling build() to finally create the link.

S

setResponseMaxAge(Duration) - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.SpringRhyme
Limit the maximum time for which the response should be cached by clients and downstream services.
SpringRhyme - Interface in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api
A request-scoped Component that you need to inject into your controllers if you want to load remote resources from an upstream service, or control the max-age cache-control directive of the response that you are rendering.

U

UrlFingerprinting - Interface in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api
Adds support for URL fingerprinting to your server-side resource implementations, by ensuring that all links in your service are using URLs that are guaranteed to change whenever the data, code or configuration of your service is updated.

W

webClientForUri(URI) - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.WebClientProvider
Returns an instance of WebClient for the given uri.
WebClientProvider - Interface in io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api
Callback interface to provide an instance of WebClient for the given uri.
withConditionalMaxAge(Duration, Duration) - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.UrlFingerprinting
Allows the URL fingerprinting logic to modify the max-age cache-control directive for the response that is currently rendered, depending on whether the incoming request is using a fingerprinted URL.

withoutFingerprint() - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.RhymeLinkBuilder
Allows to disable the addition of fingerprinting parameters only for the link that is currently being built
withQueryParameter(String, Object) - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.UrlFingerprinting
Adds another additional query parameter to all links being built with this instance (unless a query parameter with the same name already exists)
withTemplateTitle(String) - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.RhymeLinkBuilder
Used to set a different title attribute only if the generated link contains URI template variables
withTemplateVariables(String...) - Method in interface io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.spring.api.RhymeLinkBuilder
Ensures that a link template is generated that contains query parameter variables with all the given names.
